overview: VS Code Server is a remote development solution that allows developers to run Visual Studio Code (VS Code) on a remote server or cloud environment. It provides the full VS Code experience through a web browser, enabling users to edit, debug, and manage code remotely while leveraging the power of VS Code's features and extensions.
core_features: Remote access to Visual Studio Code through a web browser
Code editing, debugging, and version control capabilities
Extension support for customizing the coding environment
